attributes.action: Restrict media freedom in relation to terrorist acts in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
To amend the Media Freedom and Regulatory Standards Bill.

Part 1 Media Freedom Section 1 1.3 to include

ministers of the crown and public officials may restrict media activities at anytime, if such activities relate to graphic imagery and video of terrorist attacks within the UK.

Following the recent, terrorist attack, the graphic imagery and video footage was disturbing and only served to give the attackers notoriety and cause distress to members of the public
